title: Mutually Exclusive Events
text: The events “drawing an ace” and “drawing a king” are mutually exclusive because they cannot occur at the same time.

title: Drawing an Ace
text: The probability of drawing an ace is $$\frac{1}{13}$$

title: Drawing a King
text: the probability of drawing a spade is also $$\frac{1}{13}$$

title: Addition
text: Add the probability of drawing an ace with the probability of drawing a king.
